alert.note: Alert for Mercer; Rock Island (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 16 at 6:17PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...Patchy Dense Fog Followed By Strong Gusty Winds... Light winds ahead of an approaching cold front, and abundant low level moisture will lead to a period of fog over the next couple of hours before the front passes. The fog will be dense in some areas reducing visibility to less than a quarter mile. After the cold front passes between 7 pm and 9 pm, northwest winds will increase and visibility will rapidly improve. The northwest winds will become sustained at 15 to 25 mph and could gust to around 40 mph at times by late evening into the overnight. If traveling this evening be prepared for reduced visibilities in fog, and developing strong northwest winds.
